availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis M. Woolfe (Caldwell county, kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Woolfe. Father of Alnora Woolfe and William Woolfe. Merchant in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1860. Merchant in Caldwell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Burnesville, p. 17.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Wallonia, p. 156B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Caldwell County, KY, June 1863, p. 43.
